paper_abstract: The vertex Padmakar-Ivan (PIv) index of a graph G was introduced as the sum over all edges e = uv of C of the number of vertices which are not equidistant to the vertices u and v. In this paper we provide an analogue to the results of T. Mansour and M. Schork [The PI index of bridge and chain graphs, MATCH Commun. Math. Comput. Chem. 61 (2009) 723-734] Two efficient formulas for calculating the vertex PI index and Szeged index of chain graphs are determined. Using these formulas, the vertex PI index and Szeged index of a Spiro chain of hexagons are computed.
paper_title: The Vertex PI and Szeged Indices of Chain Graphs
